isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - INJECTION PUMP, NOZZLES, FUEL FILTER, SUPPLY PUMP AND GLOW PLUGS - FUEL FILTER/WATER SEPARATOR ASSEMBLY REMOVAL AND REASSEMBLY (U-Haul Application Only)

svcsubsec.title: FUEL FILTER/WATER SEPARATOR ASSEMBLY REMOVAL AND REASSEMBLY (U-Haul Application Only)

note.para: Prior to injection pump removal thoroughly clean the injection pump, injection nozzles, fuel filter assembly and fuel lines to prevent contamination of the fuel system. Refer to exploded views. DO NOT CLEAN WITH ENGINE RUNNING.

step1.para: Loosen and remove the fuel inlet tube (from supply pump to fuel filter) retaining clamp (1) at the water pump housing bolt.
Loosen the inverted flare tube nut (17) at the fuel supply pump (12) and tube nut (19) at elbow (10) on the filter base header (8).

note.para: Remove and discard the rubber sealing ring (18) at the tube nut (19). Use a new sealing ring during installation.

step1.para: Remove the fuel return hose (4) (leak-off) using a pliers to loosen the two clips (5). Remove the hose from the filter base (8) and fuel return tee (16).
Remove the filter to injection pump tube (6) as follows:

step2.para: Loosen and remove the connector nut at the filter base elbow (2) and discard rubber sealing ring.
If removing injection pump, loosen and remove the connector nut at the injection pump inlet connector fitting (14). Discard rubber sealing ring and cap pump opening.

step1.para: Disconnect the electrical connections at the water sensor probe, vacuum switch and heater wire.
Remove the water drain tube and hose assembly as follows:

step2.para: Loosen and remove the nuts and washers which clamp the tube at the valve cover and exhaust manifold.
Disconnect the hose (2) and tube (3) assembly from the drain bowl connection.

step1.para: Remove the filter base (8) by removing the two nuts which retain the filter base to the intake manifold. Lift the filter base off the intake manifold studs.
